response.overview: Yundi Li (aka Yundi) plays the piano to a concert audience at the Festspiel haus in Baden-Baden on May 31st, 2024.  Pieces played include: - Scherzo no.1 op.20 by Frédéric Chopin - Scherzo no.2 op.31 by Frédéric Chopin - Scherzo no.3 op.39 by Frédéric Chopin - Scherzo no.4 op.54 by Frédéric Chopin - Sonata for Piano in B minor by Franz Liszt - Sun Flowers by Yu Shi Wang (Encore) - Nocturne op. 66 by Frédéric Chopin (Encore) - "Rigoletteo" de Verdi: Concert Paraphrase by Franz Liszt (Encore)
response.title: Yundi Li Live in Concert
